# `create_KNNnetwork_dbscan`

create_KNNnetwork_dbscan


## Description

Create a spatial knn network with dbscan


## Usage

```r
create_KNNnetwork_dbscan(
  spatial_locations,
  sdimx = "sdimx",
  sdimy = "sdimy",
  sdimz = "sdimz",
  k = 4,
  ...
)
```
